27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that :the Prophet said: "Among the most dutiful of deeds is that a man nurture relations with the people his father was friends with

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِكْرَامِ صَدِيقِ الْوَالِدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Honoring The Father's Friends
